question: Which of the following ruler served as bothÂ  Mahadandanayaka as well as a Mahasandhivigrahika?
explanation: Harisena who was the composer of the Allahabad pillar inscription of Samudragupta describes that Samudra Gupta served as both Mahadandanayaka (chief judicial officer) as well as a Mahasandhivigrahika (minister for war and peace).
